instruction: Evaluate your private-equity exposure and consider lowering it through a sale of your fund stake in the secondary market or by cutting back on new private-equity commitments.
output: Understood. I will evaluate my private-equity exposure and consider selling my fund stake in the secondary market or reducing my new private-equity commitments in light of the high funding costs and potential decline in cash flows and funding ratios due to uncertain economic conditions. I will also assess my overall liquidity management strategy to ensure it aligns with these considerations.
